DialogueNode.npc_text: “Please put that back, young man. It is quite valuable.”
DialogueNode.speaker: Sebastian

DialogueNode.npc_text: “D-don’t come any closer! I-I’ve got a knife!”
DialogueNode.speaker: Young_Jason

DialogueNode.npc_text: “I see you do. And what will you do with the knife, young man? And what will you do with your life?”
DialogueNode.speaker: Sebastian

DialogueNode.npc_text: “My life? What are you talking about?”
DialogueNode.speaker: Young_Jason

DialogueNode.npc_text: “I’m talking about a frightened young boy, adrift, with no control over his destiny. Tell me, is it your will that brought you into my home and now threatens to end my life, or is it someone else’s?”
DialogueNode.speaker: Sebastian

DialogueNode.npc_text: “The answer is clear on your face. You are on the verge of manhood, lad, and your destiny is yours to make. Remember that – you are the only one who can control your life. Others may try to force their will upon you, but ultimately it will be you who will determine whether you allow yourself be used. So before you stab that knife into my heart, decide: is that what you want to do?”
DialogueNode.speaker: Sebastian

DialogueNode.npc_text: “No. I was told to come here and find something valuable. I think you just gave it to me.”
DialogueNode.speaker: Young_Jason

DialogueNode.npc_text: “There is hope for you yet, young man.”
DialogueNode.speaker: Sebastian
